level.heading: Applicability.
level.text: This chapter applies to any premarital agreement executed on or after February 9, 1996.

level.heading: Legislative History of Law 11-82
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 11-82, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 46-501.

level.heading: Editor’s Notes
level.text: Uniform Law: This section is based upon § 12 of the Uniform Premarital Agreement Act.
